description: Try our easy to follow Noodle Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Noodle salad,Low saturated fat,High protein,Seafood,Low sugar,Summer
name: Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium carrot, peeled, cut into short ribbons

recipeInstructions.text: Put beans in a bowl and cover with boiling water. Leave for a few minutes until bright green, then drain and cool in cold water.
Drain beans and toss in a large bowl with cabbage, carrot, bean shoots, shallots and crispy noodles.

Mix peanut butter, soy sauce, sugar and sesame oil in a jug. Add boiling water to thin a little bit and stir until smooth. Heat oil in a non-stick frying pan or wok. Add seafood marinara and cook for a few minutes until golden.
Pile salad onto plates, top with seafood and drizzle with satay dressing. Garnish with coriander and serve with a wedge of lime.
